mdRecord.dcterms:title: Secretary Patrick Hurley's Daughter "drawing water" for Christening of new Steamer "George Washington", August 1930
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph taken August 1930 of Secretary Patrick J. Hurley's daughter (Ruth Hurley) drawing water to be used in christening new US Line Streamer "George Washington." A film crew and photographers stand outside the dairy and Ms. Hurley emerges with a jug of water. The photograph is glued to heavy stock paper.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
